description: This source file defines the `LanguageMask` class, which manages bitmask flags to specify programming languages (Java and Native/C) for code generation purposes. It provides methods to add languages, check if a language is included, and reset the mask.

classes.name: LanguageMask
classes.description: A class representing a bitmask for selecting programming languages (Java and Native) for code generation. It allows adding languages, checking language inclusion, and resetting the mask.

methods.name: addJava
methods.description: Adds Java language support to the mask.

methods.name: hasJava
methods.description: Checks if Java is included in the language mask.

methods.name: addNative
methods.description: Adds Native (C) language support to the mask.

methods.name: hasNative
methods.description: Checks if Native (C) is included in the language mask.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Resets the language mask to zero.
